products.name: Monster Inspiration Over-Ear Noise Cancelling Headphones (MH INS OE SLV NC CUA) - Silver
products.shortDescription: Monster Inspiration headphones sound as good as they look - and they look great. With built-in noise cancelling technology, they're capable of achieving soaring highs, impactful lows, and a balanced midrange for an overall incredible listening experience. The interchangeable headband lets you personalize the headphones to suit your style or mood.

products.name: Bose SoundLink Color Bluetooth Speaker - Blue
products.shortDescription: The Bose SoundLink Color Bluetooth Speaker delivers incredible sound in a small, compact speaker design. This powerful speaker is portable and wireless, so you can bring your favourite music wherever you go thanks to Bluetooth connectivity. The rechargeable battery lasts up to 8 hours on a single charge so the party never has to stop.

products.name: Sony Over-Ear Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Headphones (MDRZX550BN) - Black
products.shortDescription: Block out external noise and get rid of any annoying cords with the Sony MDR-ZX550BN noise-cancelling Bluetooth headphones. The active noise cancellation technology allows you to focus on the music instead of distracting noise, and the Bluetooth and NFC technologies give you the freedom of listening with any wires.

products.name: Sony Over-Ear Bluetooth Headphones (MDR10RBT) - Black
products.shortDescription: Enjoy your beats without the tangle of cables. With the Sony MDR-10RBT NFC Bluetooth headphones, you can instantly stream tunes from your NFC-enabled device with a single tap. The headphones are equipped with 40mm driver units and apt-X and AAC codec support, delivering crystal-clear and balanced sound. Plus, with the plush ear cups, you'll stay comfy during long listening sessions.

products.name: Beats by Dr. Dre - Beats Solo 2 On-Ear Headphones (900-00134-01) - Black
products.shortDescription: Feel the pulse of your music with the Beats Solo2 on-ear headphones. Boasting enhanced acoustics and a wider range of sound, these headphones produce crystal-clear audio to really tune you into what you're listening to. The sleek, curved design reflects the good looks that Beats headphones are known for.

products.name: Bose QuietComfort 25 Over-Ear Noise Cancelling Headphones - Black
products.shortDescription: Whether on the plane, a crowded street or busy office, these Bose QuietComfort 25 headphones block out any unwanted noise so you can fully immerse in your favourite tunes. Comfortable earcup cushions allow for hours of listening while providing an extra level of quiet. The inline mic and remote work with select iPod, iPhone and iPad models.

products.name: Beats by Dr. Dre Powerbeats 2 In-Ear Bluetooth Headphones - Black
products.shortDescription: Pump up your workouts with the great sound and reimagined design of Beats Powerbeats 2 wireless in-ear headphones. Inspired by basketball player LeBron James, these water-resistant headphones can endure even your most gruelling workouts. They're lightweight and comfortable to keep you going when you're breaking out a sweat.

products.name: Bose SoundLink Color Bluetooth Speaker - Black
products.shortDescription: The Bose SoundLink Color Bluetooth Speaker delivers incredible sound in a small, compact speaker design. This powerful speaker is portable and wireless, so you can bring your favourite music wherever you go thanks to Bluetooth connectivity. The rechargeable battery lasts up to 8 hours on a single charge so the party never has to stop.

products.name: Apple 16GB iPod Touch - Blue
products.shortDescription: The 16GB iPod Touch offers a thin and light design with an anodized aluminum enclosure for durability and style. Its stunning retina display is just as wide but taller than previous displays so you can enjoy better graphics when playing games or whatever you love to see and do. A finger-friendly multi-touch technology makes navigation a breeze.

products.name: Bose SoundLink Mini Bluetooth Speaker - Silver
products.shortDescription: The Bose SoundLink  Mini Bluetooth  speaker is compact enough to fit in the palm of your hand, yet delivers full, natural sound. It features built-in Bluetooth technology, enabling wireless connectivity to your smartphone, tablet, or other Bluetooth device. The included charging cradle makes it easy to power up the speaker and take it on the go, anywhere, anytime.

products.name: Beats by Dr. Dre Solo 2 On-Ear Headphones - Blue
products.shortDescription: Feel the pulse of your music with the Beats Solo2 on-ear headphones. Boasting enhanced acoustics and a wider range of sound, these headphones produce crystal-clear audio to really tune you into what you're listening to. The sleek, curved design reflects the good looks that Beats headphones are known for.

products.name: Skullcandy Hesh 2 Unleashed Over-Ear Sound Isolating Bluetooth Headphones - Black
products.shortDescription: Release yourself from wires with these Skullcandy Hesh 2 Unleashed Headphones. The wireless design allows you to take your personal soundtrack anywhere you go.

products.name: Ultimate Ears BOOM Wireless Speaker - Night Black
products.shortDescription: The UE BOOM is an innovative portable speaker system  that allows you to keep the fun alive no matter where the party takes place. The 360 degree wireless speaker system blasts sound in every direction. It's water resistant and can play songs wirelessly up to 50 ft away.

products.name: Beats by Dr. Dre Pill 2.0 Bluetooth Speaker - Black
products.shortDescription: The Beats Pill 2.0 takes Dr. Dre's moniker literally with a sleek pill capsule design that boasts serious sound. Bluetooth technology lets you stream tunes from your smartphone, tablet or other enabled device, while the built-in microphone makes it easy to take hands-free calls, and NFC technology allows one-touch pairing with compatible devices.

products.name: Sony Bluetooth Speaker (SRSX5B)
products.shortDescription: Drive big, booming sound from a compact chassis. Sony's Portable Wireless Speaker fills any room with stereo sound streaming via NFC or Bluetooth connectivity. No matter where you source it, this speaker will play it, with extra bass response to really get you rocking.

products.name: Monster Superstar Wireless Speaker - Black/Grey
products.shortDescription: Enjoy larger than life sound in this compact wireless speaker. The Monster SuperStar is equipped to deliver your music, movies, games, and even conference calls in crisp, clear audio comparable to a large speaker system. Paired with your smartphone, you'll hear phone calls as you've never heard before.

products.name: Sony Wireless Speaker (SRSX2B) - Black
products.shortDescription: Enjoy a superior sound experience no matter where you are with this Sony Wireless Speaker. It connects easily with Bluetooth-enabled devices via NFC so you can wirelessly stream your favourite tunes in stereo sound, and ClearAudio+ lets you take hands-free calls.

products.name: Sony Over-Ear Noise Cancelling Headphones (MDRZX110NC) - Black
products.shortDescription: Enjoy your favourite tunes without the bother of background noise thanks to these Sony Over-Ear Noise Cancelling Headphones. These headphones provide up to 95% noise-free audio and sound-isolating technology so you can experience your music the way it was meant to be heard.

products.name: Apple 16GB iPod Touch - Grey
products.shortDescription: The 16GB iPod Touch offers a thin and light design with an anodized aluminum enclosure for durability and style. Its stunning retina display is just as wide but taller than previous displays so you can enjoy better graphics when playing games or whatever you love to see and do. A finger-friendly multi-touch technology makes navigation a breeze.

products.name: Sony In-Ear Sound Isolating Headphones (MDRAS800APB) - Black
products.shortDescription: Listen to your favourite tunes and never miss an important phone call with these MDR-AS800 active sports headphones. They feature 6mm drivers for great sound, a sporty design that ensures they stay in your ears while you're being active, and a 1.2m cord so you have freedom to move.

products.name: Beats by Dr. Dre - Beats Solo 2 On-Ear Headphones (900-00136-01) - Red
products.shortDescription: Feel the pulse of your music with the Beats Solo2 on-ear headphones. Boasting enhanced acoustics and a wider range of sound, these headphones produce crystal-clear audio to really tune you into what you're listening to. The sleek, curved design reflects the good looks that Beats headphones are known for.

products.name: Monster DNA On-Ear Sound Isolating Headphones - Carbon Black
products.shortDescription: Add all-new dimensions to your music with these cool Monster DNA over-the-ear headphones with advanced noise isolation for cutting out background disruptions. The Apple ControlTalk cable gives you simple control of playback on a compatible Apple device.

products.name: Beats by Dr. Dre - Beats Solo HD On-Ear Headphones (900-00157-01) - Purple
products.shortDescription: A lighter, on-ear version of Studio headphones, Beats Solo are compact enough to fit in your purse or bag. But don't let the small size fool you: these headphones still behold the powerful signature sound that has made Beats by Dr. Dre an iconic brand.

products.name: Bose SoundLink Bluetooth Speaker III
products.shortDescription: For a summer barbecue or night in with friends, the Bose SoundLink Bluetooth speaker III can set the mood. Pairing with any Bluetooth-enabled device, this mobile speaker blasts exceptionally rich and full sound that'll bring your favourite tunes to life. And with a super-long battery life, it'll keep the party going all night long.

products.name: Beats by Dr. Dre urBeats In-Ear Headphones (900-00168-01) - Grey
products.shortDescription: Instead of constantly replacing your ear buds, get a pair that's built to last. urBeats is the upgrade you've been looking for. The standard earbuds you receive with your music player are no match for the durability and sound of urBeats.

products.name: Sony In-Ear Sound Isolating Headphones (MDRXB50APB) - Black
products.shortDescription: Drive a better bass response with Sony Extra Bass In-Ear Headphones. Designed with a booming bass feature complemented by high energy neodymium magnets, these compact but powerful sound isolating buds maximize the audio you want to hear, and nix the noise you don't. Access clear, powerful sound for enjoying both talking and tunes.

products.name: Sony Over-Ear Noise Cancelling Headphones (MDRNC8B) - Black
products.shortDescription: These noise cancelling headphones by Sony are designed to reduce ambient noise by up to 90%, letting you groove to your tunes with vivid audio provided by 30mm drivers. Perfect for travellers, they have a folding design for convenient transport, are lightweight, comfortable and powerful.

products.name: JBL Flip 2 Bluetooth Speaker - Black
products.shortDescription: The JBL Flip 2 portable wireless speaker delivers rich, crisp audio thanks to two drivers with a built-in bass port. Small enough to fit in your hand, this tiny speaker with massive sound also features an integrated microphone with echo and noise cancellation technology so you can double up the Flip 2's function as a hands-free speakerphone.

products.name: Hed Wavz Wireless Bluetooth In-Ear Sound Isolating Headphones (BTH-8039) - Black/Silver
products.shortDescription: Perfect for exercising, these Hed Wavz Bluetooth Wireless Stereo Earbuds provide impressive sound to get you pumped up for your next workout. Don't worry about missing any important calls thanks to a built-in mic and earphone device controls, as well as a vibrating function so you know that you have a call.

products.name: Bose SoundLink Color Bluetooth Speaker - Red
products.shortDescription: The Bose SoundLink Color Bluetooth Speaker delivers incredible sound in a small, compact speaker design. This powerful speaker is portable and wireless, so you can bring your favourite music wherever you go thanks to Bluetooth connectivity. The rechargeable battery lasts up to 8 hours on a single charge so the party never has to stop.

products.name: Sennheiser HD 335s On-Ear Headphones - Black
products.shortDescription: You'll revel over pure, smooth sound and a comfortable fit with the Sennheiser HD 335S over-the-ear DJ headphones. They block outside noise for a totally immersive experience, and in-line controls let you adjust your music and more with ease.

products.name: Beats by Dr. Dre Over-Ear Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Headphone -Matte Black
products.shortDescription: Get rich, secluded sound every time you slip these babies on. Beats by Dr. Dre Beats Studio Wireless on-ear headphones feature the Beats Acoustic Engine and DSP software for enhanced clarity. Bluetooth technology means no more cable fuss.
